|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;E28F640J3A-120; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Micron;MT48LC2M32B2-6 D; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = National Semiconductor;DP83815;VS152AC, DP83815DUJB; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:05:3C |oui = 00:05:3C

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Intel PRO/Wireless 5000 LAN 3A Mini PCI Adapter |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5210; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5110; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"200-0919-003 REV A1" is etched onto one particular AP's board. *"200-0920-001 REV3" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos. This module is highly homologous to the [[Intel PRO/Wireless 5000 LAN 3A Mini PCI Adapter|Intel PRO/Wireless 5000 LAN 3A]]. {{see also|Xircom|Freescale}}
===Probable used PSU(s)=== The FCC test report specifies the '''YHI''' YC-1018-S05-U as the power supply used (5V, 2.5A).
==Links of Interest== :[http://download.intel.com/support/wireless/wlan/pro5000/PRO5000_QIG.PDF Quick Install Guide]
